name: Michael and the 6 Chapters
description:
A month after the disappearance of Jessica Avon, Michael - one of the researchers of the "Michael's Awesome Time Travel Device (MATTd)"  decides to recover the papers from the school and fix every mess they've made. But Someone is lurking within the woods of the University.

Collect all the  chapters of the Research Paper.

CONTROLS
  • W, A, S, D to move
  • E to interact
  • SHIFT to run
  • Q to zoom
This Game is Made within 1 Week (+ 2 days).
